videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: I played FINAL FANTASY mtg and THIS happened
videos.description:
FINAL FANTASY has arrived on MTG Arena and we are playing Rakdos Reanimator to show off the power of Ardyn, the Usurper and Jumbo Cactuar.

Worst Possible Merch http://www.coolstuffinc.com/cgb

MC Vegas BO1 Event: https://mcvegas.mtgfestivals.com/en-us/magic-play/ticketed-play-schedule.html?search=covertgoblue

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/8b4_S31TGU6inGniH3eUFg

Sponsors

CoolStuffInc.com Promo Code CGB5 - https://www.coolstuffinc.com/cgb
Dragon Shield Coupon Code CGB5 - https://dragonshield.com/?ref=CGB
Moxfield - https://www.moxfield.com/users/CovertGoBlue

MagicCon Vegas will feature BO1 Standard events featuring me, CGB!
https://mcvegas.mtgfestivals.com/en-us/magic-play/ticketed-play-schedule.html?search=covertgoblue

CovertGoPodcast
https://open.spotify.com/show/3RBOAznzHlbSo0X4vqtpPT?si=1e5988ab3a8f49f9
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/covertgopodcast/id1800901443
https://www.iheart.com/podcast/53-covertgopodcast-269758329/

Use promo code CGBPOD to get a discount at CoolStuffInc.com and show love for the audio podcast.

The Worst Possible Commander Show
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLKclisNxc8D8BwOwj83JZn__18bB7vBCP

Use promo code WORST at CoolStuffInc.com to show love for the paper mtg commander show!

I stream on Twitch sometimes, dropping a Twitch Prime sub helps the channel
https://www.twitch.tv/covertgoblue

Patreon subscriptions support all my content
https://www.patreon.com/covertgoblue

Socials
https://x.com/covertgoblue/
https://discord.gg/MXt3DEP
https://www.instagram.com/covertgoblue/

Credits

Written and performed by Daniel Wagner, aka CovertGoBlue
Edited by libmae_
Logo design by HolyMTG - HolyMTG@gmail.com Twitter @HolyMTG
Â© CovertGoBlue Entertainment, LLC

#cgb #mtgarena #mtgtarkir #MTGxFINALFANTASY
